entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Gros Morne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Berry Hill 7:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -7.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -8.6°C
Wind: WSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then cloudy. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening then southwest 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
